title: Trump defends FBI 'Spygate' claims amid outrage
text:
Trump defends FBI 'Spygate' claims amid outrage 3:48pm EDT - 01:48
President Donald Trump expressed no regrets over prodding the Justice Department to investigate whether the FBI spied on his presidential campaign amid uproar from Democrats and calls from Trump allies for a bigger investigation. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
President Donald Trump expressed no regrets over prodding the Justice Department to investigate whether the FBI spied on his presidential campaign amid uproar from Democrats and calls from Trump allies for a bigger investigation.
